entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
